name: Rent supplements
text:
PART VIII.  STATE RENT SUPPLEMENT PROGRAM
 
     []    The authority is authorized to make and contract to make annual payments to a "housing owner" on behalf of a "qualified tenant", as those terms are defined in this part, in amounts and under circumstances as prescribed in or pursuant to this part.  No payment on behalf of a qualified tenant shall exceed a segregated amount of $160 a month. [L 2006, c 180, pt of §2]
